page.title: 16Industry.
page.content:
2 Builders J. Yerbury Fear & Sons 2 Self Employed G.Bufton carpenters P.Slader 1 Coal merchant W.White Vineys restaurant - evening meals. Cookery School at The Grange Foresters Arms public house Woolpack public house Privately run old peoples home. Comercial Photographer at The Manse. Recording Studio for Tears For Fears.
{ Some crafts and industries are {carried on in private homes.
Mrs. Yerbury Soft furneshings Mr. Pennells Sells wood Mr. Barlow Graphic artist (His wife runs the Old Peoples Home) Others include picture framing, weaving and stained glass windows.
